text: @CNN So sad, in lights of stats/data, the obvious nature of Covid19 in its category. Unfortunately, more and hybrid of such seasonal occurrences have happened and will have infinite variations. To even think that any real control can is living a lunatic dream. KEEP Clean, be Educated.
